Name: Poinsettia
Instructions: POUR first 2 ingredients into chilled glass.
TOP with sparkling wine and briefly stir.
Review: Fruity fizz. Easy to serve at a party or gathering, this combines with this cocktail's name to make it a Christmas favourite.
History: The appearance of this cocktail is reminiscent of the red and green foliage of the plant,  which derives its name from Joel Roberts Poinsett, who is credited with introducing the plant to the US in the 1820s.
Nutrition: One serving of Poinsettia contains 103 calories
